function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission through physical contact with payment devices and surfaces in stores.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among customers and staff.","Mitigation":"Implement touch-free payment systems and regularly disinfect payment devices and surfaces.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, UV-C disinfection technology.","People":"Customers and store staff.","Owner":"Retailers and store management."},{"Description":"Inadequate space in stores can lead to crowded and congested environments, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of close contact between customers and staff, facilitating disease spread.","Mitigation":"Create more space in the store by reducing product density and using digital solutions for inventory and try-on experiences.","Technologies":"Digital inventory management systems, smart mirrors, augmented reality apps.","People":"Customers and store staff.","Owner":"Retailers and store management."},{"Description":"Limited availability of products in stores may lead to increased physical interactions and longer shopping durations, contributing to disease transmission.","Impact":"Customers may spend more time in the store trying to find specific products, leading to prolonged exposure to potential sources of contamination.","Mitigation":"Utilize digital solutions to provide accurate product availability information and offer virtual try-on experiences.","Technologies":"Smart mirrors, augmented reality apps, digital inventory management systems.","People":"Customers and store staff.","Owner":"Retailers and store management."}]}
